# The `TargetLoweringOpt` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

A convenience struct that encapsulates a DAG, and two SDValues for returning information from <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetlowering">TargetLowering</a> to its clients that want to combine. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>struct llvm::TargetLowering::TargetLoweringOpt</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

A convenience struct that encapsulates a DAG, and two SDValues for returning information from <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetlowering">TargetLowering</a> to its clients that want to combine.
